item.title: About
item.description: I’m a full-stack software developer and student pursuing a B.S. in Software Engineering with minors in Data Science and Cyber Security from Iowa State University. Professionally, I work with .NET Core and Angular designing and implementing internal and customer-facing web applications. In my own time I explore a variety of technologies and interests. I am reachable at projects@danieldway.com and here is my key.
